role_description: An Ansible role that installs the Wazuh agent on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Wazuh](https://wazuh.com/) is a free, open source and enterprise-ready security monitoring solution for threat detection, integrity monitoring, incident response and compliance.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs the Wazuh agent on nearly any platform.
